attributes.additional_details:
The current administration is demonstrating on a daily basis that it appears incompetent at managing this country during a national crisis

Many pieces of research are indicating that there has been gross mishandling of public funds for example giving significant contracts out without tendering processes which is in breach of the HM treasury guidelines 2015

There conduct in office is indeed questionable in terms of parliamentary codes of conduct and now it is envisaged that they intend to break international law
attributes.background: I would like parliament to debate on dissolving the current administration
